turkish_example_sentence: Sen uzun konuşma istememdiğinde, toplantı çabuk biter.
english_example_sentence: When you don't want long conversations, the meeting ends quickly.
russian_example_sentence: Когда ты не хочешь долгих разговоров, встреча заканчивается быстро.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen uzun konuşma ______, toplantı çabuk biter.
